title: Obama Greets Putin with 'Historic Death Stare' at G-20 Summit
body:
The intense moment was posted on Twitter byCNBC’s Eamon Javersand described by Brett Logiurato ofBusiness Insideras the president giving  Putin “a significantly intense death stare upon their meeting at the G20 summit in St. Petersburg, Russia.”pic.twitter.com/rnHrT7UUew— Eamon Javers (@EamonJavers)September 5, 2013" data-btlnk="

The handshake everyone was waiting for. Putin greets Obama in St. Petersburg, Russia. pic.twitter.com/rnHrT7UUew

— Eamon Javers (@EamonJavers) September 5, 2013

" class="bnn-if-tweet" loading="lazy" width="560" height="260" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true" allowfullscreen="true">National Journal’sMatt Vasilogambros was less dramatic in his description of the 15 second meeting between the two leaders, calling it “awkward and friendly”, and surmising that as  Obama walked away, Putin thought to himself, “Reset, my ass.”A good shot of Putin’s expression ishere.
